1.description: At Mercante you’ll find authentic Cucina Italiana featuring made-to-order traditional Italian pizzas cooked in a fiery-hot stone hearth oven. We also have pastas, salads, desserts and specialty coffees. For breakfast, try our poached egg sandwich topped with fontina fondue sauce and ham or seasonal veggies.
1.name: Mercante

2.description: Bocconcini, mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan and chevre cheese
2.name: Pizza Bianca

3.description: Basil, mozzarella, bocconcini, arugula, pickled tomatoes, artichokes
3.name: Ortonlana

4.description: Pesto, prosciutto cotto, mozzarella, gorgonzola, artichokes, pickled tomatoes
4.name: Al Pesto

7.description: Fresh lasagna sheets, béchamel and a traditional Ragu Bolognese
7.name: Lasagna

9.description: Ladyfingers, espresso, liqueurs, cacao, egg, mascarpone cream
9.name: Tiramisu
